title: Asphalt Nitro v1.0.0c
description:
Get ready for the most intense racing game on mobile that offers the most polished graphics and a unique realistic physics engine.

Take control of luxury licensed cars in breathtaking environments that you will need to tame with the most crazy stunts you can pull off! Fire up your Nitro to be the first to cross the finish line!

Certain apps allow you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site

- Take control of luxury licensed cars and push them past their limits!
- Hit the ramps and maneuver through the air while pulling off stunts
- Challenge your opponents in different games modes, but be sure to leave them in the dust!
- Catch mode is back for the first time since the earliest days of the series!
- Enjoy breathtaking environments inspired by the most incredible places on Earth!
- Discover plenty of hidden shortcuts and be the first at the finish line!
